item.title: 1. Overview
item.description: I. Introduction, basic definitions 1. Why study databases? 2. Database application examples 3. Databases are everywhere 4. Basic definitions 5. A sample database 6. DB Technology’s Trends 3-Tier Architecture Client-Server Model IV. Database management systems 1. What is DBMS? 2. Relational database 3. Typical DMBS functionalities 4. Database users 5.
